name: Soldier Sniper Battle
description:
After defeat in last battle our enemy just captured many of our important military bases in Sahara and our most important missiles defense system based jungle headquarters.Satellite Images showing that most or our commandos shot to death or killed in Air strike by enemy Bombers.
Now Robots Army Patrolling in those 2 important warfare locations.This shot and Destroy mission assigned to you by High officials.
Your army suit is equipped with all necessary maps , weapons and other heavy weapons dropped on suitable locations so that you can easily pick and use those according to your requirements.
Due to shortage of soldiers back in our country ,its totally self rescue mission too, we cannot provide you immediate Air support , for surface to ground strike.
Be careful and hunt enemy robots.
Jungle hill base camp is on fire.

Enjoy Real time FPS shooting and hunting with most advanced and trained marines combat soldier with deadly mission.
